attributes.action: Immediately bring legislation to ban the use of elephants (specifically) and all wild animals (in general) in circuses in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is generally believed that the use of wild animals in circuses is dying out, yet now a Circus is planning to introduce new elephants to this outdated practice.

The Government's position is to allow it to end naturally.  This disturbing news requires action now to stop this barbaric treatment of wild animals immediately.

Please see the blog of Born Free CEO, Will Travers for more information http://www.bornfree.org.uk/campaigns/zoo-check/circuses-performing-animals/circus-elephants/

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
